attributes.description: At AutoCity Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. And we go out of our way to ensure we deliver to the standards you would expect. We design a package around your budget. All prices exclude administration, delivery and license registration fees. Prices subject to change without prior notice. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks. Finance is subject to Bank Approval. Optional Warranty and Service plans available. Tradeins will be considered. Ts Cs Apply. EOE.

attributes.description:
FANTASTIC Interior and Exterior Condition 
Trade ins Welcome, 
In-House Finance;
Balance of Warranty and Service Plan to be confirmed with Salesman
Features: Bluetooth connectivity, USB port, Airbag quantity 2, Anti-lock braking system (ABS), Remote central locking, and much much more!
Don't miss out! Visit us Today!

Service Plan Intervals - Every 15,000km
Warranty - 4 years or 120,000km (whichever occurs first)

We offer a range of Ford specific EXTENDED as well as NEW Warranties and Service Plans. With such a variety, you are guaranteed to find a Warranty and Service Plan that will suit your individual needs as a motorist. For more information on all the above offers and specials, contact our Finance and Insurance Manager, Arianna Tzircalle on (012) 8042369 or via email at arianna@auriniaford.co.za

attributes.description:
MAZDA CX-5 2.0 DYNAMIC A/T
Stunning CX-5 Dynamic in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Reverse camera and sensors to assist with parking. Automatic transmission that allows for a smooth and comfortable drive for you and your family. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this beauty for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.
